{"id":287916383,"lang":"python3","time":"1 year, 6 months","timestamp":1577079551,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"28 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/287916383/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"12.7 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def myPow(self, x, n):\n        if x==0:\n            return 0\n        \n        def fastPow(x, n):\n            if n==0:\n                return 1.0\n            half = fastPow(x, n//2)\n            if n%2==0:\n                return half * half\n            else:\n                return half * half * x\n        \n        if n<0:\n            x = 1/x\n            n = -n\n        return fastPow(x, n)\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n"}
